TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RsaProtectedConfigurationProvider extends System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider
Public NotInheritable Class RsaProtectedConfigurationProvider Inherits ProtectedConfigurationProvider

summary.span: 提供 執行個體，可使用 RSA 加密來加密和解密組態資料。

span.span: Provides a instance that uses RSA encryption to encrypt and decrypt configuration data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可讓您用來加密機密資訊儲存在組態檔，以協助防止未經授權的存取。The class gives you a way to encrypt sensitive information stored in a configuration file, which helps protect it from unauthorized access. 使用內建執行個體，藉由宣告提供者和組態檔，而不是建立這個類別的執行個體中進行適當的設定，如中所示[範例](#examples)一節。You use the built-in instance by declaring the provider and making appropriate settings in the configuration file instead of creating an instance of this class, as shown in the [Examples](#examples) section. 物件會使用所提供的密碼編譯函數類別來加密和解密組態區段。The object uses the cryptography functions provided by class to encrypt and decrypt configuration sections. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 可以解密加密的組態檔中的資訊之前，您的 ASP.NET 應用程式的身分識別必須具有用來加密和解密組態資料的加密金鑰的 「 讀取 」 權限。Before ASP.NET can decrypt encrypted information in your configuration file, the identity of your ASP.NET application must have read access to the encryption key used to encrypt and decrypt the configuration data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說：使用受保護的組態加密組態資訊](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e1652f90-eac5-4f51-bff1-cf1acc2e1180)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Encrypting Configuration Information Using Protected Configuration](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e1652f90-eac5-4f51-bff1-cf1acc2e1180). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用標準保護或解除保護的組態區段。The following code example shows how to use the standard to protect or unprotect a configuration section. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.RsaProtectedConfigurationProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.RsaProtectedConfigurationProvider/CS/RsaProtectedConfigurationProvider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.RsaProtectedConfigurationProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.RsaProtectedConfigurationProvider/VB/RsaProtectedConfigurationProvider.vb#1)] 下列範例會顯示加密之後的摘錄自組態檔。The following example shows an excerpt from a configuration file after encryption. ```xml Rsa Key B702tRDVHJjC3CYXt7I0ucCDjdht/Vyk/DdUhwQyt7vepSD85dwCP8ox9Y1BUdjajFeTFfFBsGypbli5HPGRYamQdrVkPo07bBBXNT5H02qxREguGUU4iDtV1Xp8BLVZjQMV4ZgP6Wbctw2xRvPC7GvKHLI4fUN/Je5LmutsijA=  ```

permission.span: 取得的完整存取權限所保護的資源。

span.span: for full access to the resource protected by the permission.
Cryptographic Services

related.span: 逐步解說：使用受保護的組態加密組態資訊

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式不是直接從您的程式碼使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它會呼叫 ASP.NET 組態系統。It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
